Explore Rajasthan

Discover the majestic cities of the Land of Kings

Jaipur

The Pink City

Capital of Rajasthan, famous for stunning forts, royal palaces, and vibrant bazaars.

Amber FortHawa MahalCity Palace
Best Time: Oct - Mar
24 blogs ‚Üí

Udaipur

City of Lakes

The most romantic city in India with beautiful lakes, palaces, and sunset views.

Lake PicholaCity PalaceJag Mandir
Best Time: Sep - Mar
18 blogs ‚Üí

Jaisalmer

The Golden City

A living fort in the Thar Desert with stunning golden sandstone architecture.

Jaisalmer FortSam Sand DunesPatwon Ki Haveli
Best Time: Oct - Mar
15 blogs ‚Üí

Jodhpur

The Blue City

Home to mighty Mehrangarh Fort and blue-painted houses of the old city.

Mehrangarh FortUmaid BhawanJaswant Thada
Best Time: Oct - Mar
12 blogs ‚Üí

Pushkar

The Sacred Town

One of the oldest cities with the only Brahma Temple and famous camel fair.

Brahma TemplePushkar LakeSavitri Temple
Best Time: Oct - Mar
8 blogs ‚Üí

Mount Abu

The Hill Station

Rajasthan's only hill station with cool climate and stunning Dilwara Temples.

Dilwara TemplesNakki LakeGuru Shikhar
Best Time: Mar - Jun
6 blogs ‚Üí

Best Time to Visit

October to March is the ideal time to explore Rajasthan when the weather is pleasant and perfect for sightseeing.
